todos.title: Try AjaxProxy
todos.description: AjaxProxy is one of the most widely-used ways of getting data into your application.

todos.title: Try RestProxy
todos.description: RestProxy is a specialization of the AjaxProxy which simply maps the four actions to RESTful HTTP verbs.

todos.title: Try ScriptTagProxy
todos.description: ScriptTagProxy is useful when you need to load data from a domain other than the one your application is running on.
